job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Staffing and Recruiting
job.description: Position Senior Software EngineerSr. Java develper<br><br>Los Angeles, CA<br><br>Long term<br><br>C2C or W2<br><br><strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong>Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science Engineering or equivalent experience required.<br><br>7+ years of software development experience.<br><br>7+ years of Java server-side design and development experience.<br><br>Highly proficient in J2EE, Spring, Spring Boot and Hibernate.<br><br>Distributed Caching (Redis), Queuing technologies (ActiveMQ, Kafka), Elastic Search.<br><br>Excellent knowledge of RESTful APIs.<br><br>Experience with Data Model, SQL, and No-SQL.<br><br>Excellent knowledge of Microservices Architecture and implementation.<br><br>Experience with GitHubBitbucket, Jira, Scrum, SonarCloud and CICD processes.<br><br>Working knowledge of Linux.<br><br>Experience working on software-as-a-service (SaaS), large scale distributed systems and relationalNo-SQL databases.<br><br>Experience working in a small team setting along with offshore development team.<br><br>Strong verbal and written communication skills proven ability to lead both vertically and horizontally to achieve results thrives in a dynamic, fast-paced, environment and do what it takes to deliver results.<br><br>Committed to security practices in policy and delivery.<br><br>Show vigilance in reporting of information, security vulnerabilities whether personal devices, corporate assets, services offered to customers, or office environment.<br><br>Willing to participate in additional security and privacy trainings.<br><br>Willing to be a model citizenmentor in security practices for Greenlots.<br><br><strong><u>Preferred Experience<br><br></u></strong>Experience with AWS, RDS, Docker, Kubernetes.<br><br>Experience in Electric Grid management solutions.<br><br>Experience in Angular or similar JavaScript frameworks.<br><br>Thanks,<br><br>Raj<br><br>4880 Stevens Creek Blvd. Ste 202, San Jose, CA 95129<br><br>Phone<br><br>Email
